item.title: End OR-402 West at OR-19
item.description: End OR-402 West at OR-19 in Kimberly.

item.title: End OR-402 West at OR-19
item.description: End OR-402 West at OR-19 in Kimberly. Use OR-19 north for Spray and Arlington; OR-19 south for (John Day) Fossil Beds National Monument, Dayville, and John Day.

item.title: Entering Kimberly on OR-402 West
item.description: Entering Kimberly on OR-402 West. Kimberly is at the junction or OR-402 and OR-19, and is where the North Fork John Day River flows into the John Day River.

item.title: End OR-402 West at OR-19 - Kimberly
item.description: End OR-402 West at OR-19 in Kimberly.

item.title: OR-402 West - North Fork John Day River
item.description: North Fork John Day River bridge on OR-402 west in Monument.

item.title: OR-402 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-402 west. Distance to Monument and Kimberly.

item.title: OR-402 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-402 west. Distance to Hamilton and Monument.

item.title: East Main St. at US-395/OR-402 in Long Creek
item.description: East Main St. at US-395/OR-402 in Long Creek. Turn left for US-395 north to Ukiah and Pendleton. Turn left for US-395 south to Fox and John Day.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-402 West
item.description: US-395 south at OR-402 west to Hamilton, Monument, and Kimberly. Turn left for forest road east to Galena on the Middle Fork John Day River.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-402
item.description: US-395 South approaching OR-402 in Long Creek. Use OR-402 west for Monument and Kimberly.

item.title: OR-19 South at OR-402 Junction
item.description: OR-19 South at OR-402 east to Monument and Long Creek. Continue south on OR-19 for (John Day) Fossil Beds National Monument, Dayville, and John Day.

item.title: OR-19 South Approaching OR-402
item.description: OR-19 South approaching OR-402 to Monument.
